subject: Coupons up to 15% Off Ink & Toner Inside
body:
Quality Ink Supplies For Less at 4inkjets Save Money Off Our Already Low Prices!

**********************************************************
Code - INK722XG
15% Off All Compatible Ink
10% Off All Other Products (excludes OEM Ink)
This coupon is not applicable to OEM products and is only valid for purchases placed online.
==========================================================
Clicking on this link will automatically add the coupon code to your checkout cart.

4inkjets has a large selection of OEM and Compatible ink and Toner Products.

All our products our backed by a One Year - 100% Guaranty!

Special Deals on:
- Inkjet Cartridges for Epson, Canon, Lexmark, HP, Sharp, Brother, Xerox, more...
- Laser Toner Cartridges
- InkTec Refill Kits
- Inkjet Paper

Free U.S. Shipping on orders over 50.00. Priority Mail Available.
Same day shipping and the highest quality printer supplies!
Why shop anywhere else?

http://ramoustotally.com/t/qapdw9y7j/235110

manager1567@4inkjetsmailer.com
